body: Nature, Published online: 01 October 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03159-5 The amino acid cysteine is crucial for life but is toxic at high concentrations. A new technology platform has enabled the discovery of a protein that responds to cysteine fluctuations and regulates its breakdown.
